item.description:
Have dinner and enjoy a night of Fado and Portuguese conversation. This restaurant is owned by Dinis, a famous Portuguese singer who used to sing with Amalia Rodrigues!

He will be singing along with others. Dinner is $12.50 per person and includes two main courses, fish dish and meat dish, reservations required.

This is a tentative date for now, but these dinners generally take place on Monday nights only.

 

 

Looking to carpool?

 

Please post your info below to see who else may be interested in doing the same.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Live Portuguese Fado Dinner
